Morning! In a nutshell:

Home Store: Tends to have larger items, such as furniture and DIY
B&M Stores: Usually high street based with smaller ranges - not always stocking furniture, but SOME larger ones may!
Garden Centre Stores: Garden Centre is outside so size of store isnt 1/2

always a big factor - some small stores can still have a garden centre, even if they don't stock furniture etc!

Sorry it's not very concise, our stores are notoriously varied!

Rule of thumb is the size order is;

Home Store with G/C
Home Store
B&M Store with G/C
B&M Store
